#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,x;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        ll win[n],tie[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            win[i]=x*3;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            tie[i]=x+win[i];
        }
        cout<<*max_element(tie,tie+n)<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
